commanders.name: Jirina Kudro
commanders.oracleText:
When Jirina Kudro enters, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token for each time you've cast a commander from the command zone this game.
Other Humans you control get +2/+0.

cards.name: Nahiri, the Harbinger
cards.oracleText:
[+2]: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
[−2]: Exile target enchantment, tapped artifact, or tapped creature.
[−8]: Search your library for an artifact or creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. It gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Kelsien, the Plague
cards.oracleText:
Vigilance, haste
Kelsien gets +1/+1 for each experience counter you have.
{T}: Kelsien deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control. When that creature dies this turn, you get an experience counter.

cards.name: Trynn, Champion of Freedom
cards.oracleText:
Partner with Silvar, Devourer of the Free (When this creature enters, target player may put Silvar into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

cards.name: Silvar, Devourer of the Free
cards.oracleText:
Partner with Trynn, Champion of Freedom (When this creature enters, target player may put Trynn into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Menace
Sacrifice a Human: Put a +1/+1 counter on Silvar. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Verge Rangers
cards.oracleText:
First strike
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
As long as an opponent controls more lands than you, you may play lands from the top of your library. (You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)

cards.name: Species Specialist
cards.oracleText:
As this creature enters, choose a creature type.
Whenever a creature of the chosen type dies, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Titan Hunter
cards.oracleText:
At the beginning of each player's end step, if no creatures died this turn, this creature deals 4 damage to that player.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 4 life.

cards.name: Fireflux Squad
cards.oracleText:
Haste
Whenever this creature attacks, you may exile another target attacking creature you control. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield tapped and attacking and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Frontier Warmonger
cards.oracleText: Whenever one or more creatures attack one of your opponents or a planeswalker they control, those creatures gain menace until end of turn.

{T}, Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target legendary permanent that's an artifact, creature, or enchantment.

Flying

cards.oracleText:
Battalion — Whenever this creature and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

{1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

Vigilance

Human creatures you control have protection from creatures of the chosen type.

cards.name: Xathrid Necromancer
cards.oracleText: Whenever this creature or another Human creature you control dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.name: Captivating Crew
cards.oracleText: {3}{R}: Gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.oracleText:
Fumiko has bushido X, where X is the number of attacking creatures. (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +X/+X until end of turn.)

cards.name: Outpost Siege

As this enchantment enters, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.
• Dragons — Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, this enchantment deals 1 damage to any target.
